messages.subject: Re: OT - Our Blue Planet - great collection of satellite photos
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I ll throw another planet link at everyone...since we re all over the place with topics lately. For all you environmentalists, there was a fabulous NPR
messages.messageBody:
Well, I'll throw another planet link at everyone...since we're all
over the place with topics lately. For all you environmentalists,
there was a fabulous NPR broadcast on their "new dimensions" segment.
It's all about ecology and the environment and included some amazing
poetry:

http://www.ndbroadcasting.org/program.php?id=3154

You have to register to hear it, but it's free right now.
For all you crunchy unschoolers out there. (ok, the BBB ones too:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: OT - Our Blue Planet - great collection of satellite photos
messages.msgSnippet: To lighten things up around here...since we were mentioning our Mother Earth earlier...scroll down for awesome pictures of the world...I love the night ones
messages.messageBody:
To lighten things up around here...since we were mentioning our Mother
Earth earlier...scroll down for awesome pictures of the world...I love
the night ones and am amazed at how much light we actually use...
http://home.att.net/~hideaway_fun/442/planet.htm

Amy
